amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, $20,000,000 for the Department of Veterans Affairs for Medical Facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3704 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 59. Record Vote Number: 111.

action.text: Amendment SA 3704 proposed by Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S3873-3874; text: CR S3873-3874) To provide, with an offset, $20,000,000 for the Department of Veterans Affairs for Medical Facilities.
